detail_desc: Suit trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly and button. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a large embroidered motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing with a glittery stripe around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with an embroidered pattern. Regular waist, button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs.
Short dress in a sturdy weave that is fitted at the top and has a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a very wide, flared skirt with pleats at the top. Lined at the top.

Trainers in moulded scuba with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, fixed elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Thin coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Hat in felted wool. Width of brim 9.5 cm.
Hat in felted wool. Width of brim 9.5 cm.
Jacket in woven fabric with lightly padded shoulders, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and front pockets. Lined.
Non-wired push-up bra in microfibre with padded, moulded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Non-wired push-up bra in microfibre with padded, moulded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Straight-cut jersey top with short sleeves that end in flounces.
Microfibre and mesh Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.

Hat in felted wool with a band and turned-up brim. Width of brim 4 cm.

Baseball jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and jetted front pockets. Contrasting colour sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dungaree shorts in woven fabric with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Dungaree shorts in woven fabric with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Shorts in a patterned crêpe weave with a wide elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Sleeveless tops in soft slub cotton jersey with gathered frills and elastication around the neckline and armholes.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.

Short jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Wide shirt in patterned satin with notch lapels, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Contrasting colour trims and slits in the sides.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.

Lightly padded parka in cotton canvas with a detachable, unlined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and elasticated cuffs. Quilted lining.
Shirt in a cotton weave with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut shirt in soft viscose twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fabric badges at the top. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and lacing at the sides.

Romper suit in slub cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket with a print and appliqués on the front. Press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, and short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in jersey crêpe with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Blouse in airy viscose with embroidery on the chest, stand-up collar with smocking and an opening with a tie at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and flared cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Calf-length wrapover skirt in soft suede that fastens with two suede ties around the waist. Asymmetric hem. Lined.

Non-wired bra in an airy silk blend with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Briefs in an airy silk blend with a high waist with gathered seams, a lined front and back section and lined gusset.
Knee-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined front.

Wide jacket in washed organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, kangaroo pocket and long, raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Contrasting colour drawstring at the collar and cuffs.
Double-breasted jacket in satin with a sheen with peak lapels, large front pockets and a single back vent.
Short hooded top in scuba fabric with a slight sheen. Jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, shoulder pads and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing and a thumbhole at the cuffs.
Wide V-neck cardigan in scuba fabric with buttons down the front, diagonal front pockets, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
